DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy SYSTANE® family product ( SYSTANE® Lid Wipes , SYSTANE® BALANCE Lubricant Eye Drops , SYSTANE® Vitamins ) meibomian gland functionality subject lipid deficiency relate evaporative dry eye compare standard care warm compress .
DOC.criteria: Must clinical diagnosis lipid deficient Evaporative Dry Eye ; Meibomian Gland Functionality Not 6 gland yield liquid secretion ; Must willing discontinue use Meibomian Gland ; Dysfunction management prior receive study test article Visit 1 , end study period ; Must best correct visual acuity 20/40 Snellen good eye ; Must able follow instruction willing able attend require study visit ; Must read , sign , date Ethics Committee review approve informed consent form ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History evidence ocular intraocular surgery serious ocular trauma either eye within past 6 month ; Current punctal occlusion type ( e.g. , collagen plug , silicone plug ) ; History intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication ; History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis ( dendritic keratitis ) ; vaccinia ; active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; chronic bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; mycobacterial infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye ; Pregnant lactating time enrollment ; Not willing take adequate precaution become pregnant study ; Use concomitant topical ocular medication study period ; Use systemic medication may contribute dry eye unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior Visit 1 ; Ocular condition may preclude safe administration either drop investigation ; Unwilling discontinue contact lens wear study period least 1 week prior Visit 1 ; Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day enter study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
